meanings.definition: The process of forming a gel.
meanings.sent1: The gelation of the mixture was quick.
meanings.sent2: After hours in the fridge, the gelation of the dessert was complete.
meanings.sent3: The gelation of the jelly made it wobble like a funny dance.
meanings.sent4: The gelation of the glue held the pieces together like magic.
meanings.sent5: The gelation of the liquid turned it into a solid block.

meanings.sent1: The gelation of the substance was firm.
meanings.sent2: The gelation of the hair product gave a sleek look.
meanings.sent3: The gelation of the pudding made it look like a wiggly mountain.
meanings.sent4: The gelation of the ice created a slippery surface.
meanings.sent5: The gelation of the material made it feel smooth and solid.
